entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -31.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -31.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 20.9 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -36.4°C
Wind: W 29 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
